title: Mod Menu
description:
Did you ever feel the need of viewing your succulent mod's icons and titles in a list, touching them with your mouse button, clicking them and be greeted by information about them ? 

Well then be greeted by MOD MENU but for V-Slice ! A new mod made for V-Slice that let's you view your mods and even interact with their delicious metadata information through buttons and links ! 


(Inspired by Mod Menu for the Fabric Minecraft Mod Loader) 










                                      please Help mE , i need sLeeP

metadata.summary: Adds a mod menu with information and utilities for your installed mods.
